title: Anurag Kashyap Faces Controversy Over Comments About Brahmins
summary: Film director Anurag Kashyap sparked controversy with inflammatory comments targeting the Brahmin community, following a separate dispute related to the Phule controversy.
content:
The incident occurred when filmmaker Anurag Kashyap made controversial remarks about the Brahmin community on social media. His statement "Brahmins pe main mootunga...koi problem?" (translating to a derogatory comment about Brahmins) drew immediate backlash from various sections of society.

The comments came in the wake of an ongoing debate surrounding the Phule controversy, though specific details about this related incident remain unclear.

This latest controversy adds to a series of contentious statements made by the filmmaker, known for his outspoken nature and often polarizing views on social issues.
